sources.title: Scrappy's Relay Race (1934)
sources.description: Scrappy and the Champ compete on horseback, in cars and airplanes to win the race. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/scrappys-relay-race-1934/

metadata.Plot: Scrappy and the Champ compete on horseback, in cars and airplanes to win the race.There's a level of incoherence to this movie that makes it more interesting. Usually, Our Hero would be doing things by the book, while the villain cheats extensively. Here both sides clearly do bad things, including getting into a gun battle while in the air. Of course, we're supposed to root for Scrappy, but it's good to see the reality of competitive sports: the winning is all.
